SEARCH
Package address

Class Menu

java.lang.Object
address.Menu
public class Menu extends Object
Menu has a number of static prompt methods that will ask the user for details about a new person for use in an address book.
Since:
2024-01-25
Author:
Poleon Banouvong

  • Method Details

    • displayMenu

      public static void displayMenu()
      Outputs a menu for interacting with the address book

    • promptInput

      public static String promptInput(Scanner inputScanner, String promptText)
      Generic method for prompting and capturing input. This method will re-prompt the user if they input a line containing only whitespace.
      Parameters:
      inputScanner - The Scanner to read input from
      promptText - The text to present to the user
      Returns:
      The text input by the user

    • promptInteger

      public static int promptInteger(Scanner inputScanner, String promptText)
      Generic method for prompting and capturing an integer. This method will re-prompt the user if they input a line containing only whitespace.
      Parameters:
      inputScanner - The Scanner to read input from
      promptText - The text to present to the user
      Returns:
      The integer input by the user
